content: this super-simple knitted shawl looks effective in any variegated yarn knitted using stripes of garter and stockinette stitch with sections of eyelets this asymmetrical triangle shawl is simple to knit and easily adjusted with two size options given you can make either a small 110cm x 128cm or large 137cm x 192cm and is easily adjusted to make different sizes by missing out or adding sections gauge isn t terribly important for this shawl but if you want to check 24sts x 15 row in 10cm in stockinette and using 3 5mm needles if you like this pattern check out my blog www jo-creates com for more
